Name: Constrained Optimization
Description: Optimization problems with constraints (equality or inequality).

Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality/inequality constraints.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimization with integer variables; includes Mixed-Integer Programming (MIP).

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization with nonlinear objective or constraints.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization with a quadratic objective and linear constraints.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization over convex sets with convex objective functions.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Optimization of sequential decision problems with overlapping subproblems.
